broomExtra 5.0.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

{broomExtra}: Enhancement for {broom} and {easystats}

This package has been archived on CRAN. Additionally, it is deprecated in favour of the easystats project.

The package can still be downloaded from GitHub: pak::pak("IndrajeetPatil/broomExtra")

Acknowledgments

The hexsticker was generously designed by Sarah Otterstetter (Max Planck Institute for Human Development, Berlin). Thanks are also due to the maintainers and contributors to broom- and easystats-package families who have indulged in all my feature requests!
